title: 3 idiots
shortDescription: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

title: The Matrix
actors:
Keanu Reaves,
Laurence Fishburne,
Carrie-Anne Moss
shortDescription: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Black Friday
actors: Kay Kay,  MenonPawan Malhotra, Aditya Srivastav
shortDescription: A film about the investigations following the 1993 serial Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved --police, conspirators, victims, middlemen.

title: Dangal
actors: Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh
shortDescription: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

title: Jersey
shortDescription: A failed cricketer decides to revive his cricketing career in his late 30's despite everyone being skeptical of his ability to do so.

title: Drishyam 2
shortDescription: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

title: Sardar Udham Singh
shortDescription: A biopic detailing the 2 decades that Punjabi Sikh revolutionary Udham Singh spent planning the assassination of the man responsible for the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

title: The Terminator
writers:
James Cameron,
Gale Anne Hurd,
William Wisher
actors:
Arnold Schwarzenegger, 
Linda Hamilton, 
Michael Biegn
shortDescription: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
shortDescription: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh, who was scarred by of the India-Pakistan partition.

title: Sholay
shortDescription: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.
